original_text: After someone has read this letter to all of you, send it to the believers at Laodicea. Tell them to read it aloud to the church there. You must also read my letter that the believers at Laodicea will send to you.
korean_text: 이 편지를 너희에게서 읽은 후에 라오디게아인의 교회에서도 읽게 하고 또 라오디게아로부터 오는 편지를 너희도 읽으라

sentences.original_text: After someone has read this letter
send it to the believers at Laodicea
Tell them to read it aloud
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 그것을 소리 내어 읽으라고 말하라

sentences.original_text: You must also read my letter
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 또한 내 편지를 읽어야 한다

sentences.original_text: that the believers at Laodicea will send to you
